name: Starmie
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

attacks.name: Star Boomerang
attacks.effect: You may return Starmie and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Core Flash
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
